tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE weather_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    city VARCHAR(255),
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity INT,
    wind_speed FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE weather_forecasts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    city VARCHAR,
    forecast_date DATE,
    temperature FLOAT,
    precipitation FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE road_conditions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    road_name VARCHAR,
    condition VARCHAR,
    traffic_status VARCHAR,
    construction BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE weather_forecasts (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  city VARCHAR,
  forecast_date DATE,
  temperature FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE road_conditions (
  road_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  road_name VARCHAR,
  condition TEXT,
  traffic_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE weather_alerts (
  alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  city VARCHAR,
  issue_datetime TIMESTAMP,
  alert_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE driving_strategies (
  strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_name VARCHAR,
  recommended_speed INT,
  acceleration_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE road_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  road_id INT,
  weather_condition TEXT,
  road_speed_limit INT
)
